Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local connection local Input = (game:FindService("UserInputService") or game:GetService("UserInputService")) local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote") local InputConnection
function onEquippedL(mouse) InputConnection = Input.InputBegan:Connect(function(InputObject,Processed) if InputObject.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then if InputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Q then if Remote then Remote:FireServer(InputObject.KeyCode) end end end end) end
Tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() if InputConnection then InputConnection:Disconnect() end end) Tool.Equipped:Connect(onEquippedL)

--Made by Luckymaxer --Fixed by TakeoHonorable
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local input SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SlashSound") local Remote = (Tool:FindFirstChild("Remote") or Instance.new("RemoteEvent"));Remote.Name = "Remote";Remote.Parent = Tool Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Equipped = false SpecialReady = true SpecialActive = false
SlashDamage = 15 ReloadTime = 1 SpecialReloadTime = 30
NormalGrip = CFrame.new(0, 1.75, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0.00042643919, -0.999999881, 0, 0.999999881, 0.00042643919, -0)
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function CheckTable(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 and not IsTeamMate(Player,Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character)) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(SlashDamage) end end end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and not SpecialActive then Tool.Enabled = false local StaffSlash = Tool:WaitForChild("StaffSlash"..Humanoid.RigType.Name) StaffSlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(StaffSlash) if StaffSlashAnim then SlashSound:Play() StaffSlashAnim:Play() end wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end local touch function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") touch = Handle.Touched:Connect(Blow) if not Character or not Humanoid then return end Equipped = true Tool.Grip = NormalGrip if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end --[[spawn(function() if not SpecialReady then wait(SpecialReloadTime) SpecialReady = true end end)]] input = Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(Player,Key) if Key == Enum.KeyCode.Q then if SpecialReady and not SpecialActive then spawn(function() SpecialReady = false SpecialActive = true Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 while Equipped and Tool.GripPos.Y >= -0.25 do Tool.GripPos = Vector3.new(Tool.GripPos.X, (Tool.GripPos.Y - 0.1), Tool.GripPos.Z) wait() end if Equipped then local ShieldParts = {} local Radius = 25 ShieldModel = Instance.new("Model") ShieldModel.Name = "ShieldModel" Debris:AddItem(ShieldModel, 20) ShieldModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") for i = 1, 15 do local ShieldPart = Instance.new("Part") ShieldPart.Name = "ShieldPart" ShieldPart.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") ShieldPart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic ShieldPart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block ShieldPart.FormFactor = Enum.FormFactor.Custom ShieldPart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth ShieldPart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth ShieldPart.Size = Vector3.new(Radius, 0.4, Radius) ShieldPart.Anchored = true ShieldPart.CanCollide = false ShieldPart.Locked = true ShieldPart.Transparency = (0.25 + (0.05 * (i - 0))) local Mesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") Mesh.Parent = ShieldPart table.insert(ShieldParts, ShieldPart) ShieldPart.Parent = ShieldModel ShieldPart.CFrame = Character:GetModelCFrame() - Vector3.new(0, ((Character:GetModelSize().Y / 2) - (ShieldPart.Size.Y / 2) - (ShieldPart.Size.Y * (i - 1))), 0) end spawn(function() local IgnoreObjects = {Character, ShieldModel} while ShieldModel and ShieldModel.Parent do local Humanoids = {} for i, v in pairs(ShieldParts) do if v and v.Parent then local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new((v.Size.X / 2), 0, (v.Size.Z / 2)) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new((v.Size.X / 2), 0, (v.Size.Z / 2)) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(v.Position - NegativePartRadius, v.Position + PositivePartRadius), IgnoreObjects, 100) for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local humanoid = v.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not CheckTable(Humanoids, humanoid) then table.insert(Humanoids, humanoid) end end end end end for i, v in pairs(Humanoids) do if v and v.Parent and v.Health > 0 and not IsTeamMate(Player,Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(v.Parent)) then UntagHumanoid(v) TagHumanoid(v, Player) v:TakeDamage(v.MaxHealth) if v.Health == 0 and v.Parent then for i, v in pairs(v.Parent:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") then v.Anchored = true end end end end end wait() end end) wait(SpecialReloadTime) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 Tool.Grip = NormalGrip SpecialActive = false SpecialReady = true end end) end end
end) end
function Unequipped() if touch then touch:Disconnect() end if input then input:Disconnect() end Equipped = false SpecialActive = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 if StaffSlashAnim then StaffSlashAnim:Stop() end if ShieldModel and ShieldModel.Parent then ShieldModel:Destroy() end end
Tool.Activated:Connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
